page.title: 09TRAMWAY DAY AT GLYN CEIRIOG
page.content: In the summer of 1985 the Glyn Valley Tramway Group held an open day at Glyn Ceiriog .The old tramway ran from Pandy to Chirk and this special day was to mark the 50th anniversary of the closure of the line . It closed on the 6th July 1935 . At the exhibition was one ofthe coaches that ran on the line,which has been preserved and now used on the Talyllyn Railway.There were also commemorative coach services, photographs and model railway demonstrations. The grpup hope to have a replica open carriage on an exhibition track in the valley soon.There is already a small museum.They have also published a book which contains many pictures.
